Name: Metang Scarf
LongDescription: Enables the Pokémon to deal full damage to Dark-type enemies using Psychic-type moves. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Beldum, Metang, and Metagross.  Finding a Metang Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
